channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA GPU and Tegra hardware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA GPU and Tegra hardware

item.title: CVE-2021-34399|2024-08-04T00:12:49.877Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20gpu%20and%20tegra%20hardware
item.description: NVIDIA GPU and Tegra hardware contain a vulnerability in the internal microcontroller which may allow a user with elevated privileges to gain access to information from unscrubbed registers, which may lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2021-34400|2024-08-04T00:12:49.808Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20gpu%20and%20tegra%20hardware
item.description: NVIDIA GPU and Tegra hardware contain a vulnerability in the internal microcontroller which may allow a user with elevated privileges to gain access to information from unscrubbed memory, which may lead to information disclosure.
